scripts.init: yarn && concurrently "cd main && yarn" "cd children && yarn" "cd main-ssr && yarn"
scripts.clean: concurrently "cd main && rm -rf node_modules yarn.lock" "cd children && rm -rf node_modules yarn.lock" "cd main-ssr && rm -rf node_modules yarn.lock"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd main && npm run serve" "cd children && npm start"
scripts.dev:ssr: concurrently "cd main-ssr && npm start" "cd children && npm start"
